spell_tooltip.description: Fire Breath burns away 1 beneficial Magic effect per empower level from all targets.
While Obsidian Scales is active you gain immunity to interrupt, silence, and pushback effects.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Reinforce your scales, reducing damage taken by 30%. Lasts 12 sec.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Disintegrate channels 20% faster.
Wing Buffet's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.
Fly to an ally and heal them for 743,043, or heal yourself for the same amount.
Essence regenerates 10% faster.
Obsidian Scales has an additional charge.
Store 20% of your effective healing, up to 226,578. Your next damaging Living Flame consumes all stored healing to increase its damage dealt.
Interrupt an enemy's spellcasting and prevent any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 4 sec.
Tail Swipe's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.
Casting Emerald Blossom or Verdant Embrace reduces the cast time of your next Living Flame by 40%.
Your Magic damage done is increased by 4%.
Compress time to make your next empowered spell cast instantly at its maximum empower level.
Your Leech is increased by 4%.
Magic damage taken reduced by 16%.
Your Stamina is increased by 8%.
Hover lasts 4 sec longer.
Fire Breath's damage over time lasts 4 sec longer.
While above 75% health, your movement speed is increased by 10%.
The flames of life surround you for 8 sec. While this effect is active, 100% of damage you take is healed back over 8 sec.
Emerald Blossom and Verdant Embrace instantly heal you for 185,168 when cast.
Sunder an enemy's protective magic, dealing 1.2 million Spellfrost damage to absorb shields.
Renewing Blaze's cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Swoop to an ally and fly with them to the target location. Clears movement impairing effects from you and your ally.
Fire Breath causes your next Living Flame to strike 1 additional target per empower level.
Hover gains 1 additional charge.
Rescue protects you and your ally from harm, absorbing damage equal to 30% of your maximum health for 5 sec.
Deep Breath stuns enemies for 3 sec.
Lob a ball of flame, dealing 281,153 Fire damage to the target and nearby enemies.
Your Living Flame has a 20% chance to cause an Essence Burst, making your next Disintegrate or Pyre cost no Essence.
Azure Strike has a 15% chance to cause an Essence Burst, making your next Disintegrate or Pyre cost no Essence.
Pyre's Essence cost is reduced by 1.
Quell's cooldown is reduced by 20 sec.

Focus your energies to release a salvo of pure magic, dealing 1 million Spellfrost damage to an enemy. Damages additional enemies within 25 yds when empowered.

I:   Damages 2 enemies.

II:  Damages 4 enemies.

III: Damages 6 enemies.
Pyre has a 30% chance to flare up and explode again on a nearby target.

Erupt with draconic fury and exhale Pyres at 3 enemies within 25 yds.

For 18 sec, Essence Burst's chance to occur is increased to 100%, and you gain the maximum benefit of Mastery: Giantkiller regardless of targets' health.
Disintegrate deals 16% more damage.
Living Flame deals 44,158 damage over 12 sec to enemies, or restores 93,748 health to allies over 12 sec. Stacks 3 times.
Casting an empower spell extends the duration of Dragonrage by 5 sec, up to a maximum of 20 sec.
Essence Burst stacks 2 times.
An explosion bombards the target area with white-hot embers, dealing 380,461 Fire damage to enemies over 6 sec.
Fire Breath deals 30% more damage.
Eternity Surge and Shattering Star hit twice as many targets.
Eternity Surge deals 15% increased damage to your primary target.
During Deep Breath and Dragonrage you gain the maximum benefit of Mastery: Giantkiller regardless of targets' health.
Exhale bolts of concentrated power from your mouth at 2 enemies for 310,825 Spellfrost damage that cracks the targets' defenses, increasing the damage they take from you by 20% for 4 sec.
Pyre and Living Flame have a 15% chance to cause your next Firestorm to be instantly cast without triggering its cooldown, and deal 100% increased damage.
Fire Breath damage has 16% chance to cause your next Living Flame to be instant cast, stacking 2 times.
Your damaging critical strikes deal 230% damage instead of the usual 200%.
Deep Breath reduces the Essence costs of Disintegrate and Pyre by 1 and increases their damage by 10% for 12 sec after you land.
Your empower spells' maximum level is increased by 1, and they reach maximum empower level 20% faster.
Essence Burst increases the damage of affected spells by 15.0%.

After casting 9 Pyres, your next Pyre will explode into a Firestorm. 

In addition, Pyre and Disintegrate deal 20% increased damage to enemies within your Firestorm.
Fire Breath causes enemies to take up to 40% increased damage from your Red spells, increased based on its empower level.

Disintegrate reduces the remaining cooldown of your empower spells by 0.50 sec each time it deals damage.

Pyre reduces the remaining cooldown of your empower spells by 0.40 sec per enemy struck, up to 2.0 sec.
Engulf your target in dragonflame, damaging them for 773,247 Fire or healing them for 725,267. For each of your periodic effects on the target, effectiveness is increased by 50%.
Tail Swipe and Wing Buffet scorch enemies and blind them with ash, causing their next attack within 4 sec to miss.
Engulf reduces the cooldown of Fire Breath by 6 sec.
Essence abilities are enhanced with Flame, dealing 20% of healing or damage done as Fire over 8 sec.
Critical strike chance against targets above 50% health increased by 15%.
Engulf quickens your pulse, reducing the cast time of your next spell by 30%. Stacks up to 2 charges.
Fire Breath deals its damage in 20% less time.
Living Flame and Azure Strike have 1 extra chance to trigger Essence Burst when they critically strike.
Engulf gains 1 additional charge and deals 20% increased damage and healing.
Renewing Blaze also applies to your target or 1 nearby injured ally at 50% value.
Engulf consumes 2 sec of Fire Breath from the target, detonating it and damaging all nearby targets equal to 900% of the amount consumed, reduced beyond 5 targets.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

Your healing done and healing received are increased by 2%.
Disorient an enemy for 20 sec, causing them to sleep walk towards you. Damage has a chance to awaken them.
